short_summary: Invitation to tender for Ion chromatograph.
full_summary:
## Ion Chromatograph Tender Announcement

### Title
Bid for the supply, delivery, installation, and calibration of an Ion Chromatograph for the National Research Council Canada (NRC)

### Reference Number
CB-479-3959473 - Amendment 8

### Solicitation Number
23-58110

### Tender Announcement Details
* **Publication Date**: October 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 19, 2023 at 14:00 (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 20, 2024

### Summary
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) issuues a bid for the supply, delivery, installation, and calibration of an Ion Chromatograph. The Ion Chromatograph is required for the analysis of water quality and component degradation in PEM water electrolysis stations.

### Procurement Information
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **.vendor selection criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada- Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Interest**: British Columbia, Canada

### Tender Documents
The tender documents can be found on the following links:
* English (pdf): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21195/23-58110_npp_en_ion-chromotograph.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21195/23-58110_npp_en_ion-chromotograph.pdf)
* French (pdf): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21195/23-58110_npp_fr_chromatographe.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21195/23-58110_npp_fr_chromatographe.pdf)

### Contact Information
For any queries related to the bid, please contact:
* Name: Kacendra Dion
* Email: [Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca)
